H0.text: Which Greek philosopher taught at the Lyceum. Plato

H1.text: Which Greek philosopher taught at the Lyceum. Epicurus

H2.text: Which Greek philosopher taught at the Lyceum. Zeno of Citium

H3.text: Which Greek philosopher taught at the Lyceum. Aristole

A4.text: Aristotle established his school in the Lyceum in Athens

A5.text: Aristotle conducted courses and research at the school for the next twelve years
